name: Bingo 2015 - Bingo Of New Era
description:
= CRAZY ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY =
Cycle through as many bingo balls as possible, covering your cards with daubs and showering yourself in coins, xp and prizes!
The hit Bingo game that took Facebook by storm is now in the palm of your hand! Team up with your friends and work together to earn more bonus rewards! Send and receive free gifts to watch your team soar to the top. Charged power ups give you the advantage to win big and unlock room after room of bling. Plus, come back every day to try your luck on the daily spinner and win free extras…just for playing!

Please note that Bingo 2015 is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to Settings Menu -> General -> Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content". In addition, Bingo!™ may link to social media services, such as Facebook will have access to your information through such services.
